001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
006
007import java.net.URI;
008import java.util.Optional;
009
010public record PersistentSubscriberConfiguration(ObjectNode json)
011        implements JsonElement {
012
013    public String getName() {
014        return getString("name").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("name"));
015    }
016
017    public URI getURI() {
018        return getURI("uri").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("uri"));
019    }
020
021    public String getStream() {
022        return getString("stream").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("stream"));
023    }
024
025    public Optional<String> getCheckpointProvider() {
026        return getString("checkpointProvider");
027    }
028
029    public Optional<String> getErrorLogProvider() {
030        return getString("errorLogProvider");
031    }
032
033    public Configuration getConfiguration() {
034        return new Configuration(json).getConfiguration("configuration");
035    }
036}
